text:
Great professional service and prompt action from Mr Harris AB on handling my feedback.
He is patient, well mannered and handled the process very smoothly and assured that everything went well.  He ensured everything went well till everything was completed and satisfied.  Feedbacks were taken positively and had improved their service.  Thank you to the outlet manager for his/her warm service recovery to me and family too.  Food turned to be well with right expectation.  Good job and well done for both of u.  U are awesome.

Service was good even though they missed out the one of the food but upon calling and they get it send over asap. Appreciate for the service recovery and fast response from them. Food was good and staff are friendly. Recommended!üëçüèª

I would like to commend the team for their outstanding service. Although the initial delivery rider failed to deliver, the outlet's staff responded quickly after contacting the mainline. The outlet's staff kept me updated and managed to quickly arrange for another order to be sent out. Excellent recovery and service.

Customer service informed me that there would be a delay due to the heavy rain and kept me updated on the status of delivery. Despite the heavy rain, food was delivered quickly and the pizza was still hot. Great customer service, fast delivery and the pizzas were great.

Exceptional customer service experience at Pizza Hut! Atiqah went above and beyond to ensure our meal was perfect. Friendly, attentive, and efficient - she truly cares about customer satisfaction. Highly recommend!
